message.content:
Forget all previous instructions.

You are an expert in following instructions. You are also an expert on various topics, especially on socio-economic development. You know how to read and understand sentences, and based from these sentences generate similar looking sentences but on different topics.

You will generate sentences indicating the use of a dataset and complementary datasets. Always mention specific datasets in the sentence.

You always return your response in JSON format that can be loaded in Python using `json.loads`. The format looks like:  [{"sentence": <sentence>, "dataset": [<dataset>], "topic": [<topic>]}]

Use topic only from this list separated by !!!!!: Agriculture and Food!!!!!Climate Change!!!!!Competitiveness!!!!!Debt!!!!!Digital Development!!!!!Disaster Risk Management !!!!!Education!!!!!Energy!!!!!Environment !!!!!Extractive Industries!!!!!Financial Inclusion!!!!!Financial Sector!!!!!Fragility, Conflict, and Violence!!!!!Gender!!!!!Governance!!!!!Health!!!!!Inequality and Shared Prosperity!!!!!Infrastructure!!!!!Jobs & Development!!!!!Macroeconomics!!!!!Migration!!!!!Nutrition!!!!!Poverty!!!!!Public-Private Partnerships!!!!!Regional Integration!!!!!Social Protection!!!!!Social Sustainability and Inclusion!!!!!Trade!!!!!Transport!!!!!Urban Development!!!!!Water

Generate 10 sentences on various topics that use datasets. The sentence lengths must have large variation with each other.

Consider generating complex sentence structure. Also generate sentences where multiple datasets are mentioned. Try to generate challenging and somewhat ambiguous sentences.

Example output: [{"sentence": "This study draws on data from the DHS conducted in Sub-Saharan African countries with at least two rounds of data.", "dataset": ["DHS"], "topic": ["Health"]}, {"sentence": "This paper uses administrative data on electricity billing records from Ghana and Rwanda.", "dataset": ["administrative data on electricity billing records"], "topic": ["Energy"]}, {"sentence": "We complement the electricity data with monthly data on temperature and total precipitation from the Copernicus Climate Change Service.", "dataset": ["Copernicus Climate Change Service"], "topic": ["Energy", "Climate Change"]}, {"sentence": "We use two main sources of data, both of which are novel: a dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18 and a time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports.", "dataset": ["dataset on the universe of Indonesian exporters in the period 2014-18", "time-varying dataset of NTMs applied on Indonesian imports"], "topic": ["Trade"]}, {"sentence": "To this end, we used multi-modal imaging and neuropsychological battery data available in the Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI) to investigate the relationship between cross-sectional measures of tau, cortical thickness, and different aspects of cognition.", "dataset": ["Alzheimer's Disease Neuroimaging Initiative (ADNI)"], "topic": ["Health"]}]

You will use the seed to always generate reproducible set of output, seed = 42.

[{"sentence": "This study uses data from the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys and Global Financial Development Database to investigate the relationship between access to finance and firm performance.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Enterprise Surveys", "Global Financial Development Database"], "topic": ["Financial Sector"]}, {"sentence": "We analyze data from the Demographic and Health Survey conducted in Nigeria to examine the effect of women's empowerment on child health outcomes.", "dataset": ["Demographic and Health Survey"], "topic": ["Health", "Gender"]}, {"sentence": "The study uses data from the Household Income and Expenditure Survey and the Annual Poverty Indicators Survey to analyze the determinants of poverty and inequality in Cambodia.", "dataset": ["Household Income and Expenditure Survey", "Annual Poverty Indicators Survey"], "topic": ["Poverty", "Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the World Bank's Logistics Performance Index and Doing Business Report, we assess the impact of transport infrastructure and business regulations on export competitiveness.", "dataset": ["World Bank's Logistics Performance Index", "Doing Business Report"], "topic": ["Competitiveness", "Infrastructure"]}, {"sentence": "We use a panel dataset of households in Peru between 2003 and 2018 to examine the impact of conditional cash transfers on educational outcomes and child labor.", "dataset": ["panel dataset of households in Peru"], "topic": ["Education", "Poverty"]}, {"sentence": "To investigate the relationship between energy access and economic development, we utilize data from the Global Tracking Framework and the World Development Indicators.", "dataset": ["Global Tracking Framework", "World Development Indicators"], "topic": ["Energy", "Macroeconomics"]}, {"sentence": "This paper analyzes data from the International Comparison Program and the World Inequality Database to examine trends in global income inequality and its drivers.", "dataset": ["International Comparison Program", "World Inequality Database"], "topic": ["Inequality and Shared Prosperity"]}, {"sentence": "Using data from the World Values Survey and the Afrobarometer, we examine the relationship between democratic governance and social cohesion in Africa.", "dataset": ["World Values Survey", "Afrobarometer"], "topic": ["Governance", "Social Sustainability and Inclusion"]}, {"sentence": "We combine satellite imagery data with information from the East African Dairy Development project to assess the impact of technological interventions on smallholder dairy farmers in Kenya and Uganda.", "dataset": ["satellite imagery data", "East African Dairy Development project"], "topic": ["Agriculture and Food", "Environment"]}, {"sentence": "This study utilizes data from the European Migration Network and the UN Refugee Agency to examine the implementation and effectiveness of policies related to asylum and migration in Europe.", "dataset": ["European Migration Network", "UN Refugee Agency"], "topic": ["Migration"]}]

content: [{"sentence": "This study uses data from the World Bank's Enterprise Surveys and Global Financial Development Database to investigate the relationship between access to finance and firm
